title: "Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information" Please help.
body: Hello fellow summoners, i am recently having trouble with opening the lol on mac, and everytime i open it. It stays on the Userkernal for a long time, and then says "Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information". Please help.

replies.body:
>Hello fellow summoners

oh god the nostalgia

But anyway, what happens when you visit [this site](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)?
Please post logs so I may take a look and guide you in the right direction.
